name: Dimitri Kozma Art Gallery DX - REMAKE
name_original: Dimitri Kozma Art Gallery DX - REMAKE
description:
NEW AND BOLD   DX FULL REMAKE VERSION of   my   surreal experimental platformer. This isn't exactly a game, it's more like an interactive experience. You control a person in a virtual tour to see  all kinds of paintings and artwork created by Dimitri Kozma  in     a experimental tour in a strange world.

Instructions:
Left Key - Walk Left
Right Key - Walk Right
Up Key - Jump
Up Key Twice - Double Jump
Down Key - Crouch
X Button - See Art Info (In dev)
ESC Key - Exit to menu

This game may still have some glitches.  Just leave a comment and we can fix it! 

MATURE CONTENT WARNING: Nudity and blood.

Keywords: Art Surreal experimental platform game Funny Cartoon Strange Fun Gallery Exposition Design Painting Illustration Draw Lineart Surrealism Surrealist
